Articles.Content: OMG yessssss! Great work :D Thank you!
Excuse me, folks! Forgive my ignorance, please, but what is that blueish display with an almost round shape? To me it looks like a diagram of the ship but it does not match the pod...

http://i.imgur.com/1czQSQ6.png

Excuse me, folks! Forgive my ignorance, please, but what is that blueish display with an almost round shape? To me it looks like a diagram of the ship but it does not match the pod...

It is. It is just shaped like the alcor pod the props originate from.
THANK YOU SO MUCH I LOVE It
Mark 1-2 Pod and Mark 3 Pod IVA Replacement is done by Alexustas itself:cool:.[removed link to defunct website]

http://i.imgur.com/1czQSQ6.png

Excuse me, folks! Forgive my ignorance, please, but what is that blueish display with an almost round shape? To me it looks like a diagram of the ship but it does not match the pod...

It shows the occupied seats in the pod. It's based off the ALCOR pod, which has 3 seats. You can see that there are two spots that are red-unlit, not green-lit (because the Mk1 pod can only really contain 1 Kerbal). I dunno...Space filler I suppose?
I don't see action group buttons for the inline mk1 cockpit. And it could really use another screen or two.

I don't see action group buttons for the inline mk1 cockpit. And it could really use another screen or two.

I am totaly forgot about that, sorry. Update coming soon

It shows the occupied seats in the pod. It's based off the ALCOR pod, which has 3 seats. You can see that there are two spots that are red-unlit, not green-lit (because the Mk1 pod can only really contain 1 Kerbal). I dunno...Space filler I suppose?

I think so. I agree it's nice on a compatible pod, but I'm not so sure about this one... Anyway, it looks very nice and techy!

Mk1 Cockpit done. Added AG thumblers to Mk1 Inline Cockpit.

Edited October 30, 2015 by RangeMachine
Is there a way to silence the ground prox alarm in the lander can when say for example you know you are trying to land (not CFIT).

Is there a way to silence the ground prox alarm in the lander can when say for example you know you are trying to land (not CFIT).

Try to click on it

Try to click on it

I tried that. I even tried clicking a lot. Though in the way of support the world around, maybe now that somebody else told me to it will suddenly work. I will try it the next time I start KSP. Thanks Range.

I tried that. I even tried clicking a lot. Though in the way of support the world around, maybe now that somebody else told me to it will suddenly work. I will try it the next time I start KSP. Thanks Range.

The easiest way - delete this file.

P.S. I did not exacly understand what this alram means. Somebody can explain me?

- - - Updated - - -

I missed GPWS switch, i will add it soon.

Edited October 30, 2015 by RangeMachine
These are glorious, keep up the good work

Congrats, great mod!

I like very much how the IVA looks now.

Waiting for the rest of the command pods. It would be great if you could coordinate with other modders to add your IVA design to their capsules. I use extensively Kerbal Planetary Base Systems by nils277 and the cupola or command modules could look impressive with your magic touch

How will you decide the order to do things now that the Mk1 pod and lander can are done? Personally I am waiting eagerly for the large lander can and Mk2 spaceplane cockpit since most of my designs seem to use these. Maybe we could do a poll?

How will you decide the order to do things now that the Mk1 pod and lander can are done? Personally I am waiting eagerly for the large lander can and Mk2 spaceplane cockpit since most of my designs seem to use these. Maybe we could do a poll?

Check the OP
Any chance you could make 'retro' versions of the IVAs? Using old radial & tape dials? (Like Mercury, Apollo, ect.)
I feel like it'd be rather unnecessary to do the Mk1-2 pod since the ASET guy did such an amazing job with his own version. I'd like to see a Cupola and Mk3 cockpit though!

I feel like it'd be rather unnecessary to do the Mk1-2 pod since the ASET guy did such an amazing job with his own version. I'd like to see a Cupola and Mk3 cockpit though!

Mk3 has been done too.

I feel like it'd be rather unnecessary to do the Mk1-2 pod since the ASET guy did such an amazing job with his own version. I'd like to see a Cupola and Mk3 cockpit though!

More options is not worse -- as long as we can mix and match between them. I'm rather fond of the Mk1 cockpits from this pack (three different variants): http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96148-V5-0-RC1-released-AeroKerbin-Industries-Modified-IVAs but like what IVA Upgrade does, as well.

Mk3 has been done too.

Wait, someone gave the ASET treatment to the Mk3 cockpit? I wasn't aware of this!

Wait, someone gave the ASET treatment to the Mk3 cockpit? I wasn't aware of this!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132856-IVA-1-0-4-MK3-Pod-IVA-Replacement-by-Apex-(WIP)
I think the inline is missing the GPWS off switch as seen in the center of this image.
